casename: Jeyaretnam Joshua Benjamin v Indra Krishnan
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Appellant in person; Davinder Singh SC and Hri Kumar (Drew & Napier) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Insolvency Law/Bankruptcy/Bankruptcy order/Default by debtor under arrangement reflected in consent order/Prior consent by debtor to bankruptcy order being made/Whether creditor right to proceed with bankruptcy petition/Whether burden on creditor to prove inability of debtor to pay debts/Whether arrangement extortionate
